svg.style: background: #FFFFFF; background-color: light-dark(#FFFFFF, #121212); color-scheme: light dark;
svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/138.0.0.0 Safari/537.36" version="27.1.6" scale="1" border="0"> <diagram name="Google Gemini AI Innovation Accelerator" id="diagram-id-final"> <mxGraphModel dx="2951" dy="1576" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="3300" pageHeight="2400" background="#FFFFFF" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="title" value="Google Gemini powered AI Innovation Accelerator<div><span style="font-weight: normal;"><font style="font-size: 11px;">- Vijay Khanna&nbsp;https://www.linkedin.com/in/vijay-khanna/</font></span></div>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontSize=28;fontStyle=1;fontColor=#1A73E8;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="50" y="20" width="2400" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="purpose" value="<div style="text-align: center;"><b>Purpose:</b> A revolutionary framework to augment human intellect by systematically solving complex problems and generating breakthrough ideas at scale. It integrates a powerful AI ecosystem with proven innovation methodologies, grounded in enterprise data.</div>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=1;fontSize=14;fontColor=#5F6368;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="250" y="70" width="2000" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="arch_container" value="Multi-Layered Architecture" style="swimlane;fontStyle=1;startSize=30;fontSize=18;collapsible=0;strokeColor=#34A853;fillColor=#E6F4EA;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="50" y="160" width="1600" height="1450" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="layer1" value="User Interaction Layer" style="swimlane;fontStyle=1;startSize=26;fontSize=14;horizontal=1;rounded=1;collapsible=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#E8F0FE;strokeColor=#1A73E8;" parent="arch_container" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="40" y="50" width="1520" height="200" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="comp_cli" value="<b>Gemini CLI</b><br><i>Developer-centric command-line interface</i><hr><div style="text-align:left;">• Scriptable interaction for automation<br>• Execution of complex, multi-step prompts<br>• Integration into CI/CD &amp; data pipelines<br>• Facilitates rapid iteration &amp; feedback</div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=top;fillColor=#FFFFFF;strokeColor=#1A73E8;shadow=1;" parent="layer1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="560" y="40" width="400" height="140" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="layer2" value="Orchestration & Agency Layer" style="swimlane;fontStyle=1;startSize=26;fontSize=14;horizontal=1;rounded=1;collapsible=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#FCE8E6;strokeColor=#D93025;" parent="arch_container" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="40" y="260" width="1520" height="240" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="comp_adk" value="<div><b><br></b></div><b>Google Agent Development Kit (ADK)</b><br><i>Open-source framework for building agents</i><hr><div style="text-align:left;">• Agent orchestration of complex logic<br>• Seamless tool integration &amp; API mgmt<br>• Stateful, long-running task &amp; memory<br>• Observability (Cloud Trace/Logging)</div>" style="shape=hexagon;perimeter=hexagonPerimeter2;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=top;fillColor=#FFFFFF;strokeColor=#D93025;shadow=1;" parent="layer2" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="300" y="50" width="400" height="160" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="comp_agentengine" value="<div><b><br></b></div><b>AgentEngine</b><br><i>Custom logic for problem-solving</i><hr><div style="text-align:left;">• Implements the core innovation workflow<br>• Translates prompts into action plans<br>• Selects &amp; applies methodologies<br>• Coordinates data &amp; tool usage</div>" style="shape=hexagon;perimeter=hexagonPerimeter2;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=top;fillColor=#FFFFFF;strokeColor=#D93025;shadow=1;" parent="layer2" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="820" y="50" width="400" height="160" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="6VqXdVwcdAoYA9pVcodq-16" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.016;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" edge="1" parent="layer2" source="comp_adk" target="comp_agentengine"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="layer3" value="Intelligence & Reasoning Layer" style="swimlane;fontStyle=1;startSize=26;fontSize=14;horizontal=1;rounded=1;collapsible=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#F3E8FD;strokeColor=#9334E6;" parent="arch_container" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="40" y="510" width="1520" height="220" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="comp_gemini" value="<div><b><br></b></div><div><b><br></b></div><b>Gemini 2.5 Pro</b><br><i>The cognitive powerhouse of the framework</i><hr><div style="text-align:left;">• <b>Context Window:</b> 1M Tokens<br>• <b>Reasoning:</b> Advanced multi-step<br>• <b>Modality:</b> Native multimodal<br>• <b>Agency:</b> Sophisticated tool use</div>" style="shape=cloud;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=top;fillColor=#FFFFFF;strokeColor=#9334E6;shadow=1;" parent="layer3" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="522" y="30" width="470" height="170" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="layer4" value="Methodology Abstraction Layer" style="swimlane;fontStyle=1;startSize=26;fontSize=14;horizontal=1;rounded=1;collapsible=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#FEF7E0;strokeColor=#F9AB00;" parent="arch_container" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="40" y="740" width="1520" height="240" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="comp_triz" value="<div><b><br></b></div><b>TRIZ / ARIZ Module</b><br><i>Systematic Innovation Framework</i><hr><div style="text-align:left;">• ARIZ algorithm for problem dissection<br>• Identifies &amp; resolves core contradictions<br>• Applies 40 Inventive Principles</div>" style="shape=parallelogram;perimeter=parallelogramPerimeter;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=top;fillColor=#FFFFFF;strokeColor=#F9AB00;shadow=1;" parent="layer4" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="300" y="60" width="400" height="140" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="comp_debono" value="<div><b><br></b></div><b>De Bono's Thinking Tools Module</b><br><i>Creative &amp; Analytical Framework</i><hr><div style="text-align:left;">• Parallel Thinking (Six Thinking Hats)<br>• Directed Attention Tools (CAF, C&amp;S)<br>• Lateral Thinking (PO, Random Entry)</div>" style="shape=parallelogram;perimeter=parallelogramPerimeter;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=top;fillColor=#FFFFFF;strokeColor=#F9AB00;shadow=1;" parent="layer4" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="820" y="60" width="400" height="140" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="layer5" value="Data, Tooling & Integration Ecosystem" style="swimlane;fontStyle=1;startSize=26;fontSize=14;horizontal=1;rounded=1;collapsible=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#E6F4EA;strokeColor=#34A853;" parent="arch_container" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="40" y="990" width="1520" height="440" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="comp_agentspace" value="<b>AgentSpace &amp; Enterprise Search</b><br><i>Governed Data Platform</i><hr><div style="text-align:left;">• Secure, IAM-based data access<br>• Agent governance &amp; grounding<br>• Access to structured &amp; unstructured data</div><div style="text-align:left;">* Deep Research on Internet / Private Repo</div><div style="text-align:left;"><br></div>" style="shape=cylinder3;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;boundedLbl=1;backgroundOutline=1;size=15;align=center;verticalAlign=top;spacingTop=4;fillColor=#FFFFFF;strokeColor=#34A853;shadow=1;" parent="layer5" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="150" y="60" width="400" height="160" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="comp_rag" value="<b>RAG Augmentation Databases</b><br><i>Real-time Data Retrieval</i><hr><div style="text-align:left;">• Google Cloud Vector Search</div><div style="text-align:left;">* PDF's in GCS Object Storage<br>• BigQuery Vector Search &amp; Embeddings<br>• AlloyDB AI<br>• Google Search on Internet as a RAG source</div>" style="shape=cylinder3;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;boundedLbl=1;backgroundOutline=1;size=15;align=center;verticalAlign=top;spacingTop=4;fillColor=#FFFFFF;strokeColor=#34A853;shadow=1;" parent="layer5" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="557" y="240" width="400" height="160" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="comp_realworld" value="<b>Real-World System Integrations</b><br><i>Tooling API</i><hr><div style="text-align:left;">• ERP and CRM platforms<br>• IoT and SCADA systems<br>• Manufacturing &amp; Supply Chain systems<br>• Code repositories &amp; CI/CD pipelines</div><div style="text-align:left;">* Slack, Jira, Asana</div>" style="shape=process;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;backgroundOutline=1;align=center;verticalAlign=top;fillColor=#FFFFFF;strokeColor=#34A853;shadow=1;" parent="layer5" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1010" y="60" width="400" height="140" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="6VqXdVwcdAoYA9pVcodq-15" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=0.743;exitY=1.014;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;exitPerimeter=0;entryX=0.158;entryY=0.269;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" edge="1" parent="arch_container" source="comp_adk" target="comp_gemini"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="770" y="400" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="820" y="350" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="l9AMuRio3YFRHwXgmFWj-1" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#1A73E8;edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;" parent="1" source="comp_cli" target="comp_adk" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="590" y="320" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="l9AMuRio3YFRHwXgmFWj-4" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#9334E6;edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="720" y="840" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="720" y="960" as="targetPoint" /> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="720" y="841" /> <mxPoint x="720" y="959" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="l9AMuRio3YFRHwXgmFWj-5" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#9334E6;edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;exitX=0.91;exitY=0.772;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;exitPerimeter=0;" parent="1" source="comp_gemini" target="comp_debono" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="1040" y="840" /> <mxPoint x="1040" y="840" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="l9AMuRio3YFRHwXgmFWj-6" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#34A853;edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;" parent="1" source="comp_agentspace" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="400" y="1200" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="847" y="870" as="targetPoint" /> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="440" y="1190" /> <mxPoint x="847" y="1190" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="l9AMuRio3YFRHwXgmFWj-7" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#34A853;edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;entryX=0.499;entryY=0.953;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" parent="1" source="comp_rag" target="comp_gemini" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="l9AMuRio3YFRHwXgmFWj-8" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#34A853;edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;entryX=0.753;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" parent="1" source="comp_realworld" target="comp_adk" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="1320" y="460" /> <mxPoint x="730" y="460" /> <mxPoint x="730" y="470" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="l9AMuRio3YFRHwXgmFWj-9" value="Feedback Loop" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;strokeColor=#F9AB00;edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;dashed=1;" parent="1" source="comp_debono" target="comp_agentengine" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="workflow_container" value="The Innovation Workflow in Action" style="swimlane;fontStyle=1;startSize=30;fontSize=18;collapsible=0;strokeColor=#F9AB00;fillColor=#FEF7E0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1700" y="160" width="800" height="1450" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="wf1" value="<b>1. Problem Definition</b><br>A user defines a high-level challenge or goal via the Gemini CLI. The AgentEngine initiates the workflow." style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=top;fillColor=#FFFFFF;strokeColor=#1A73E8;shadow=1;spacing=10;" parent="workflow_container" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="50" y="60" width="700" height="100" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="wf2" value="<b>2. Massive Context Ingestion</b><br>The agent ingests all relevant internal (AgentSpace) and external (RAG) data in one go into Gemini 2.5 Pro's 1M token context window for holistic understanding." style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=top;fillColor=#FFFFFF;strokeColor=#34A853;shadow=1;spacing=10;" parent="workflow_container" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="50" y="220" width="700" height="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="wf3" value="<b>3. Systematic Analysis</b><br>The agent applies ARIZ logic to pinpoint the core contradiction and uses De Bono's tools for a balanced, multi-perspective examination." style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=top;fillColor=#FFFFFF;strokeColor=#F9AB00;shadow=1;spacing=10;" parent="workflow_container" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="50" y="400" width="700" height="100" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="wf4" value="<b>4. Creative Solution Generation</b><br>The agent leverages TRIZ's 40 Inventive Principles against the core contradiction, using Gemini 2.5 Pro's reasoning to brainstorm concrete, novel solutions." style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=top;fillColor=#FFFFFF;strokeColor=#9334E6;shadow=1;spacing=10;" parent="workflow_container" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="50" y="560" width="700" height="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="wf5" value="<b>5. Validation & Iteration</b><br>Proposed solutions are presented to the user. The agent runs simulations, performs cost-benefit analyses using real-time data, and refines proposals based on the iterative feedback loop." style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=top;fillColor=#FFFFFF;strokeColor=#D93025;shadow=1;spacing=10;" parent="workflow_container" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="50" y="740" width="700" height="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="wf_out" value="<b>Output: Validated Solution & Actionable Roadmap</b>" style="shape=document;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;boundedLbl=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;fillColor=#E6F4EA;strokeColor=#34A853;shadow=1;fontSize=14;" parent="workflow_container" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="250" y="920" width="300" height="100" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="l9AMuRio3YFRHwXgmFWj-10" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=3;strokeColor=#5F6368;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" parent="workflow_container" source="wf1" target="wf2" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="l9AMuRio3YFRHwXgmFWj-11" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=3;strokeColor=#5F6368;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" parent="workflow_container" source="wf2" target="wf3" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="l9AMuRio3YFRHwXgmFWj-12" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=3;strokeColor=#5F6368;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" parent="workflow_container" source="wf3" target="wf4" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="l9AMuRio3YFRHwXgmFWj-13" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=3;strokeColor=#5F6368;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" parent="workflow_container" source="wf4" target="wf5" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="l9AMuRio3YFRHwXgmFWj-14" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=3;strokeColor=#5F6368;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" parent="workflow_container" source="wf5" target="wf_out" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="bottom_container" value="" style="group" parent="1" vertex="1" connectable="0"> <mxGeometry x="50" y="1650" width="2450" height="500" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="use_cases_container" value="Transformative Use Cases" style="swimlane;fontStyle=1;startSize=30;fontSize=18;collapsible=0;strokeColor=#1A73E8;fillColor=#E8F0FE;" parent="bottom_container" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry width="1600" height="280" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="uc1" value="<div><b><br></b></div><b><div><b><br></b></div><div><b><br></b></div>Business Innovation &amp; Product Ideation</b><br>Creates a continuous innovation pipeline by analyzing market trends, competitor patents, and customer feedback to identify 'white space' opportunities and generate novel product&nbsp;<div>concepts.</div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=top;fillColor=#FFFFFF;strokeColor=#1A73E8;shadow=1;spacing=8;" parent="use_cases_container" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="40" y="50" width="500" height="200" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="uc2" value="<div><b><br></b></div><b><div><b><br></b></div>Solving Complex Scientific Challenges</b><br>For intractable problems in science, the framework creates a 'digital twin' of the problem space to run simulations and find optimal solutions that are impossible to discover manually (e.g., accelerating drug discovery)." style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=top;fillColor=#FFFFFF;strokeColor=#1A73E8;shadow=1;spacing=8;" parent="use_cases_container" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="550" y="50" width="500" height="200" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="uc3" value="<div><b><br></b></div><b><div><b><br></b></div>Supply Chain Reinvention</b><br>Transforms a brittle, reactive supply chain into a resilient, proactive, and optimized network by identifying core contradictions and designing dynamic, flexible models validated through simulation." style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=top;fillColor=#FFFFFF;strokeColor=#1A73E8;shadow=1;spacing=8;" parent="use_cases_container" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1060" y="50" width="500" height="200" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="tech_container" value="Technical & Deployment Considerations" style="swimlane;fontStyle=1;startSize=30;fontSize=18;collapsible=0;strokeColor=#5F6368;fillColor=#F1F3F4;" parent="bottom_container" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1650" width="800" height="280" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="tech_text" value="<div style="text-align:left; line-height:1.5;"><b>Security:</b> All data calls are routed through IAM-secured AgentSpace. ADK provides policy enforcement hooks for fine-grained control.<br><hr><b>Scalability:</b> Stateless microservices scale via Kubernetes. The orchestrator maintains state and memory in a scalable backend (e.g., Redis, Vertex AI Vector Search).<br><hr><b>Observability:</b> ADK emits traces to Google Cloud Trace and logs to Google Cloud Logging for full end-to-end visibility.<br><hr><b>Grounding &amp; Safety:</b> AgentSpace enforces grounding by restricting data access to authorized sources. Simulation and real-time data validation close the loop before recommendations reach the user.</div>" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=top;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=1;fontSize=13;spacing=5;" parent="tech_container" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="30" y="40" width="740" height="230" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 2398px; height: 1px; padding-top: 33px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #1A73E8;

display: inline-block; font-size: 28px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#1A73E8, #4f9cff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Google Gemini powered AI Innovation Accelerator
- Vijay Khanna https://www.linkedin.com/in/vijay-khanna/

switch.text: Google Gemini powered AI Innovation Accelerator...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1998px; height: 1px; padding-top: 93px; margin-left: 201px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #5F6368;
display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#5F6368, #96999d); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
text-align: center;

div.div: Purpose: A revolutionary framework to augment human intellect by systematically solving complex problems and generating breakthrough ideas at scale. It integrates a powerful AI ecosystem with proven innovation methodologies, grounded in enterprise data.

switch.text: Purpose: A revolutionary framework to augment human intellect by systematically solving complex problems and generating breakthrough ideas at scale. It integrates a powerful AI ecosystem with proven innovation methodologies, grounded in enterprise data.

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(230, 244, 234), rgb(21, 33, 24)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(52, 168, 83), rgb(47, 146, 73));
fill: light-dark(rgb(232, 240, 254), rgb(25, 32, 44)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(26, 115, 232), rgb(79, 156, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1518px; height: 1px; padding-top: 216px; margin-left: 41px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;

display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: User Interaction Layer

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 255, 255), rgb(18, 18, 18)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(26, 115, 232), rgb(79, 156, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 398px; height: 1px; padding-top: 250px; margin-left: 601px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.div:
• Scriptable interaction for automation
• Execution of complex, multi-step prompts
• Integration into CI/CD & data pipelines
• Facilitates rapid iteration & feedback

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(252, 232, 230), rgb(48, 30, 29)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(217, 48, 37), rgb(255, 136, 127));

div.div: Orchestration & Agency Layer

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 255, 255), rgb(18, 18, 18)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(217, 48, 37), rgb(255, 136, 127));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 398px; height: 1px; padding-top: 470px; margin-left: 341px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.div:
• Agent orchestration of complex logic
• Seamless tool integration & API mgmt
• Stateful, long-running task & memory
• Observability (Cloud Trace/Logging)

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 255, 255), rgb(18, 18, 18)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(217, 48, 37), rgb(255, 136, 127));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 398px; height: 1px; padding-top: 470px; margin-left: 861px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.div:
• Implements the core innovation workflow
• Translates prompts into action plans
• Selects & applies methodologies
• Coordinates data & tool usage

div.div: Intelligence & Reasoning Layer

div.div:
• Context Window: 1M Tokens
• Reasoning: Advanced multi-step
• Modality: Native multimodal
• Agency: Sophisticated tool use

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 255, 255), rgb(18, 18, 18)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(249, 171, 0), rgb(150, 83, 0));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 398px; height: 1px; padding-top: 960px; margin-left: 341px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;

div.div:
• ARIZ algorithm for problem dissection
• Identifies & resolves core contradictions
• Applies 40 Inventive Principles

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 255, 255), rgb(18, 18, 18)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(249, 171, 0), rgb(150, 83, 0));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 398px; height: 1px; padding-top: 960px; margin-left: 861px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.div:
• Parallel Thinking (Six Thinking Hats)
• Directed Attention Tools (CAF, C&S)
• Lateral Thinking (PO, Random Entry)

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(230, 244, 234), rgb(21, 33, 24)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(52, 168, 83), rgb(47, 146, 73));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1518px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1156px; margin-left: 41px;

display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: Data, Tooling & Integration Ecosystem

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 255, 255), rgb(18, 18, 18)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(52, 168, 83), rgb(47, 146, 73));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 398px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1244px; margin-left: 191px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.div:
• Secure, IAM-based data access
• Agent governance & grounding
• Access to structured & unstructured data
* Deep Research on Internet / Private Repo

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 255, 255), rgb(18, 18, 18)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(52, 168, 83), rgb(47, 146, 73));

div.div: • Google Cloud Vector Search

* PDF's in GCS Object Storage
• BigQuery Vector Search & Embeddings
• AlloyDB AI
• Google Search on Internet as a RAG source

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 255, 255), rgb(18, 18, 18)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(52, 168, 83), rgb(47, 146, 73));

div.div:
• ERP and CRM platforms
• IoT and SCADA systems
• Manufacturing & Supply Chain systems
• Code repositories & CI/CD pipelines
* Slack, Jira, Asana

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(26, 115, 232), rgb(79, 156, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(26, 115, 232), rgb(79, 156, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(52, 168, 83), rgb(47, 146, 73)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(52, 168, 83), rgb(47, 146, 73));
fill: light-dark(rgb(52, 168, 83), rgb(47, 146, 73)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(52, 168, 83), rgb(47, 146, 73));
fill: light-dark(rgb(52, 168, 83), rgb(47, 146, 73)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(52, 168, 83), rgb(47, 146, 73));
fill: light-dark(rgb(249, 171, 0), rgb(150, 83, 0)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(249, 171, 0), rgb(150, 83, 0));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 787px; margin-left: 1060px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000; background-color: #ffffff;

display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); white-space: nowrap;

div.div: Feedback Loop

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(254, 247, 224), rgb(31, 25, 5)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(249, 171, 0), rgb(150, 83, 0));

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 255, 255), rgb(18, 18, 18)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(26, 115, 232), rgb(79, 156, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 682px; height: 1px; padding-top: 228px; margin-left: 1710px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
1. Problem Definition
A user defines a high-level challenge or goal via the Gemini CLI. The AgentEngine initiates the workflow.

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 255, 255), rgb(18, 18, 18)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(52, 168, 83), rgb(47, 146, 73));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 682px; height: 1px; padding-top: 388px; margin-left: 1710px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
2. Massive Context Ingestion
The agent ingests all relevant internal (AgentSpace) and external (RAG) data in one go into Gemini 2.5 Pro's 1M token context window for holistic understanding.

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 255, 255), rgb(18, 18, 18)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(249, 171, 0), rgb(150, 83, 0));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 682px; height: 1px; padding-top: 568px; margin-left: 1710px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
3. Systematic Analysis
The agent applies ARIZ logic to pinpoint the core contradiction and uses De Bono's tools for a balanced, multi-perspective examination.

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 255, 255), rgb(18, 18, 18)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(147, 52, 230), rgb(216, 135, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 682px; height: 1px; padding-top: 728px; margin-left: 1710px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
4. Creative Solution Generation
The agent leverages TRIZ's 40 Inventive Principles against the core contradiction, using Gemini 2.5 Pro's reasoning to brainstorm concrete, novel solutions.

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 255, 255), rgb(18, 18, 18)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(217, 48, 37), rgb(255, 136, 127));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 682px; height: 1px; padding-top: 908px; margin-left: 1710px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
5. Validation & Iteration
Proposed solutions are presented to the user. The agent runs simulations, performs cost-benefit analyses using real-time data, and refines proposals based on the iterative feedback loop.

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(230, 244, 234), rgb(21, 33, 24)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(52, 168, 83), rgb(47, 146, 73));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 298px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1108px; margin-left: 1901px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(95, 99, 104), rgb(150, 153, 157)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(95, 99, 104), rgb(150, 153, 157));
fill: light-dark(rgb(95, 99, 104), rgb(150, 153, 157)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(95, 99, 104), rgb(150, 153, 157));
fill: light-dark(rgb(95, 99, 104), rgb(150, 153, 157)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(95, 99, 104), rgb(150, 153, 157));
fill: light-dark(rgb(95, 99, 104), rgb(150, 153, 157)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(95, 99, 104), rgb(150, 153, 157));
fill: light-dark(rgb(95, 99, 104), rgb(150, 153, 157)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(95, 99, 104), rgb(150, 153, 157));
fill: light-dark(rgb(232, 240, 254), rgb(25, 32, 44)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(26, 115, 232), rgb(79, 156, 255));

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 255, 255), rgb(18, 18, 18)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(26, 115, 232), rgb(79, 156, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 486px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1706px; margin-left: 48px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Business Innovation & Product Ideation
Creates a continuous innovation pipeline by analyzing market trends, competitor patents, and customer feedback to identify 'white space' opportunities and generate novel product
concepts.

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 255, 255), rgb(18, 18, 18)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(26, 115, 232), rgb(79, 156, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 486px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1706px; margin-left: 558px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Solving Complex Scientific Challenges
For intractable problems in science, the framework creates a 'digital twin' of the problem space to run simulations and find optimal solutions that are impossible to discover manually (e.g., accelerating drug discovery).

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 255, 255), rgb(18, 18, 18)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(26, 115, 232), rgb(79, 156, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 486px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1706px; margin-left: 1068px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Supply Chain Reinvention
Transforms a brittle, reactive supply chain into a resilient, proactive, and optimized network by identifying core contradictions and designing dynamic, flexible models validated through simulation.

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(241, 243, 244), rgb(27, 29, 30)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(95, 99, 104), rgb(150, 153, 157));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 732px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1693px; margin-left: 1685px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 13px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
text-align:left; line-height:1.5;

div.div:
Security: All data calls are routed through IAM-secured AgentSpace. ADK provides policy enforcement hooks for fine-grained control.
Scalability: Stateless microservices scale via Kubernetes. The orchestrator maintains state and memory in a scalable backend (e.g., Redis, Vertex AI Vector Search).
Observability: ADK emits traces to Google Cloud Trace and logs to Google Cloud Logging for full end-to-end visibility.
Grounding & Safety: AgentSpace enforces grounding by restricting data access to authorized sources. Simulation and real-time data validation close the loop before recommendations reach the user.

switch.text: Security: All data calls are routed through IAM-secured AgentSpace. ADK provides policy enforcement hooks for fin...
